## Documentation Issue

Describe the issue with the documentation.

## Location

Where is the documentation issue?

- [ ] README.md
- [ ] WHITEPAPER.md

- [ ] Code documentation (inline comments)
- [ ] API documentation
- [ ] Other: [specify]

## Type of Issue

- [ ] Typo or grammatical error
- [ ] Incorrect information
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Unclear or confusing explanation
- [ ] Outdated content
- [ ] Broken link
- [ ] Other: [specify]

## Current Content

Quote or describe the current documentation content that has an issue.

## Suggested Improvement

How should the documentation be improved? Provide the corrected or improved version if possible.
